modName: Frida - A Generous CBBE BodySlide Preset
summary:
This is a CBBE Bodyslide preset that was used for Frida's figure at the end of "Vinelle: Discovery", her first story appearance.

This mod contains 2 separate presets;
Normal (Frida), to be used for naked bodies or outfits with no support for the breasts.
Stuffed (Frida - Stuffed), to be used for armor and clothing.
descriptionHtml:
Due to interest for the body presets featured in my stories about Vinelle, I have decided to upload the first one of these.

[size=4][b]Background info:[/b]
[/size]
This specific preset was the one used by Frida at the end of her treatment, featuring a slightly larger chest than she had at the beginning.

The story in question is [url=https://imgur.com/a/2diRsje]Vinelle: Discovery[/url]﻿ (Mature Warning), the first part of her introductory trilogy.

Overall this is a body type with a generous chest, large butt, and thick thighs, representing the "medium" size among my presets.
Size 0 is still a petite frame, which slowly grows to Frida's body at size 100, allowing for a wider range of body types should you wish to use this.

[b][size=4]Content:[/size][/b]

This mod comes with two separate [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/]CBBE BodySlide[/url] presets:
Use the normal one (Frida) when building the naked body, as well as for armor/clothing with no visible/logical support for breasts.
Use the stuffed one (Frida - Stuffed) when building armor/clothing with straps, bras, plates, or other devices that would lift and squeeze their chest.

[b][size=4]Installation:[/size]
[/b]
Simply drop the "Data"-folder into your Skyrim folder.
Then you should be able to find the presets in your BodySlide program, in the upper left corner under "presets".

[b][size=4]Additional Credits:[/size]
[/b]
The muscles seen in the screenshots can be found in ﻿[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13377/]Sporty Sexy Map[/url]﻿.

The armour worn is from [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83383]The Amazing World of Bikini Armor[/url]﻿.
author: BargingMass
